languages.text: "Ну что, законник, теперь ты знаешь, что я дезертир. Все еще хочешь учить меня жизни? Наставлять на правильный путь?"

traits.locale_text: "Ну что, законник, теперь ты знаешь, что я дезертир. Все еще хочешь учить меня жизни? Наставлять на правильный путь?"

languages.text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"
languages.original_text: "Ну что, законник, теперь ты знаешь, что я дезертир. Все еще хочешь учить меня жизни? Наставлять на правильный путь?"

traits.locale_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"
"So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"
"So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"
"So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"
"So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"
"So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"

languages.text: 「で、法執行官さん。アタシが脱走兵だってわかったのよね。それでもまだアタシに人生の説教を垂れて、正しい道とやらに導くつもり？」
languages.original_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"

traits.locale_text: 「で、法執行官さん。アタシが脱走兵だってわかったのよね。それでもまだアタシに人生の説教を垂れて、正しい道とやらに導くつもり？」

languages.text: "So, Gesetzeshüter, nun wisst Ihr, dass ich eine Deserteurin bin. Wollt Ihr mir immer noch sagen, wie ich mein Leben zu leben habe, und versuchen, mich auf den rechten Pfad zu führen?"
languages.original_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"

traits.locale_text: "So, Gesetzeshüter, nun wisst Ihr, dass ich eine Deserteurin bin. Wollt Ihr mir immer noch sagen, wie ich mein Leben zu leben habe, und versuchen, mich auf den rechten Pfad zu führen?"

languages.text: « Alors, cher représentant de l'ordre, vous savez maintenant que je suis une déserteuse. Vous avez toujours envie de me dire comment vivre ma vie et d'essayer de me remettre dans le droit chemin ? »
languages.original_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, cher représentant de l'ordre, vous savez maintenant que je suis une déserteuse. Vous avez toujours envie de me dire comment vivre ma vie et d'essayer de me remettre dans le droit chemin ? »

languages.text: «Bueno, legislador, ahora ya sabe que soy una desertora. ¿Todavía cree que puede decirme cómo vivir mi vida y meterme en vereda?».
languages.original_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, legislador, ahora ya sabe que soy una desertora. ¿Todavía cree que puede decirme cómo vivir mi vida y meterme en vereda?».

languages.text: “好了，法务官，你现在知道我是个逃兵了。你还打算教导我怎么过好自己的生活，还打算指引我走上正确的道路吗？”
languages.original_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"

traits.locale_text: “好了，法务官，你现在知道我是个逃兵了。你还打算教导我怎么过好自己的生活，还打算指引我走上正确的道路吗？”

languages.text: "Artık kaçak olduğumu biliyorsun kanuncu. Yine hayatıma burnunu sokup bana yol yordam göstermeye çalışacak mısın?"
languages.original_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"

traits.locale_text: "Artık kaçak olduğumu biliyorsun kanuncu. Yine hayatıma burnunu sokup bana yol yordam göstermeye çalışacak mısın?"

languages.original_text: "So, lawman, now you know I'm a deserter. Still feel like telling me how to live my life and trying to put me on the right path?"
